author: Paul Rankin
method: Place all of the ingredients into a mixing bowl. Use your hands to mix everything together.  Pile the salad on a plate and serve immediately.
ingredients: 200g/7oz couscous, cooked according to packet instructions,  pinch chilli flakes,  55g/2oz cooked green beans, chopped,  3 tbsp chopped fresh mint leaves,  2 tbsp pistachio nuts, shelled,  ½ pomegranate, seeds only,  ½ orange, zest and juice,  ½ lemon, juice only,  2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
